name: Day 1: 06-17-2022
activities: landed @ Billy Bishop, took free shuttle to Union Station, walked to Hilton
stopped at Eaton Centre to get a shirt and a gift for someone
took TTC to Holt Renfrew, got another gift
dropped off gifts @ Hotel, took TTC to College to meet fam
met fam, ate vegan tacos at La Bartola and poutine
walked with Abeer and Uzlifat, stopped at hotel for gifts
sleep

name: Day 2: 06-18-2022
activities: went for a walk and took some photos in Old Town
took TTC (several legs) to Aga Khan museum
took a bus back towards downtown, saw a scenic lookout on the map and got off early
took pics at Chester Hill lookout, then walked until I encountered a Bike Share Toronto bike
biked to Rolltation Sushi Burrito on Yonge St, had a burrito, returned to Hilton
rideshared to Harbourfront Centre to meet Abeer and Uzlifat again and walk around
had some food with fam @ Roundhouse Park at the base of the CN tower
walked around a bit more, drove to grab a burger with fam @ Desi Burger on Gerrard St E
Abeer dropped me back @ hotel

name: Day 3: 06-19-2022
activities: took a tram to a local Tim Horton's, was displeased just looking at the menu, got a latte somewhere else
got a sweater and sweatpants from Roots @ Brookfield Place
rode a BST bike to Cherry Beach, took a kayak from Toronto SUP & Kayak into Lake Ontario
took tons of photos of the CN Tower and the shore from my kayak in the harbour
biked to Kim's Convenience, took pics
walked to Nathan Phillips Square to take photos and read
ate lunch/dinner at PLANTA Queen
turned in to do some work, got out again around midnight for a late night solo dinner
